verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: WASHINGTON] — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he is thinking " very seriously " about pardoning Muhammad Ali , even though the Supreme Court vacated the boxing champion 's conviction in 1971] .
WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said he [V: is] thinking " very seriously " about pardoning Muhammad Ali , even though the Supreme Court vacated the boxing champion 's conviction in 1971 .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] is [V: thinking] " [ARGM-MNR: very seriously] " [ARG1: about pardoning Muhammad Ali] , [ARGM-ADV: even though the Supreme Court vacated the boxing champion 's conviction in 1971] .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] is thinking " very seriously " about [V: pardoning] [ARG1: Muhammad Ali] , even though the Supreme Court vacated the boxing champion 's conviction in 1971 .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said he is thinking " very seriously " about pardoning Muhammad Ali , even though [ARG0: the Supreme Court] [V: vacated] [ARG1: the boxing champion 's conviction] [ARGM-TMP: in 1971] .
